pages.title: Dragon Resources
pages.text: Killing the end dragon grants the opportunity to create a brand new armor set which ranks above Netherite, however this is not cheap. To obtain enough resources to craft this armor you need to beat the end dragon multiple times, how many times depends on how lucky you are when butchering the dragon carcass.

pages.title: Dragon Scales
pages.text: One of the resources obtained by killing the end dragon. These will be required in creation of the dragon scale armor

pages.title: Dragon Bones
pages.text: Another resource obtained by killing the end dragon. These will need to be sharpened before being able to use them in the crafting recipes. To do this place them inside a stonecutter.

pages.title: Recipes
pages.text: The template can be found in end city loot chests. The materials can be obtained from butchery the end dragon carcass.

pages.title: Dragon Scale Armor
pages.text: To create dragon scale armor you will be a dragon scale template, dragon scale ingot and a piece of netherite armor. Combine all 3 in a smithing table and you will have crafted the dragon scale armor.
